function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"More people choosing natural forest parks over urban parks during the COVID-19 pandemic.","Impact":"Increased potential for congestion and close contact in natural forest parks.","Mitigation":"Implement crowd control measures and restrictions to manage visitor density.","Technologies":"Surveillance systems for monitoring park capacity and real-time visitor tracking.","People":"Visitors to natural forest parks, local communities, and park management authorities.","Owner":"Local authorities, park management authorities, and government agencies."},{"Description":"Tree canopies creating a more comfortable microclimate in forest areas.","Impact":"Potential for increased congregation of people in shaded areas, leading to close contact.","Mitigation":"Provide clear guidelines on safe distancing in shaded areas and distribute information on alternative open areas for activities.","Technologies":"Digital signage for safety reminders and real-time crowd monitoring systems.","People":"Visitors to forest areas, local communities, and park management authorities.","Owner":"Local authorities, park management authorities, and government agencies."},{"Description":"Reported boost in immune function from forest therapy and exposure to phytoncides.","Impact":"Potential reliance on forest therapy as a sole method for immune function enhancement, neglecting other health practices.","Mitigation":"Promote a holistic approach to health that includes diverse outdoor and indoor activities for immune function enhancement.","Technologies":"Health education platforms, wearable activity trackers, and wellness promotion apps.","People":"Public health authorities, wellness practitioners, and individuals seeking immune function enhancement.","Owner":"Health organizations, wellness centers, and government health departments."}]}
